task.title: Maintaining a Web Server
task.shortdesc: Maintaining a web server is really quite easy.

step.cmd: If the web server crashes, restart it.
Limit the number of connections to your server.
step.info: This will make it run faster.

step.cmd: Make sure you do not put confidential material on your server.
step.info: It should be kept in a separate folder named "Private."
